cause.description:
Help support Dave and his mission in kicking the pope in the nuts.
Since his young age David Chan has been meaning to kick the pope in the nuts. It has been his life long goal for a long period of time.
Therefore, everybody should join him on his mission to go kick the pope in the nuts, thanks,
Join this cause if you support his mission!!!
1. He should get kicked in the nuts
2. Kick him in the nuts
3. Row shambo
cause.mission: Kick the pope in the nuts
cause.name: Pope
